summary:
My First Retexture (just learned it like yesterday)

RECENTLY: I cut down the size, keeping the resolution. It\'s not a HUGE file, but they are slightly big.

A re-texture of the Jester Clothing to a Black and Dark Masquerade theme. (In the pictures are my modded Mehrune Dagger, eyes, and gold (Not sure if the gold is sh
descriptionHtml:
This is a followup design from my Masquerade Character (Myvotri Varefar) from Oblivion. It is my first texture, and I love intricate designs. I work slow, but I do like to take REQUESTS (for ideas). Uploading other textures randomly. Some may be good, some may be bad haha.

Installation:

(IF this is uploaded via WinRAR Just unpack it/open it up/drag and drop, you should know what to do)

Just drag the data folder into the Data Folder of your Skyrim Folder (Steamapps).

Follow the same instructions any other texture mod tells you to do. Obviously :)

Credits to me for distribution please! 

And have fun with it!

I\'ve always been a fan of drawing/masquerade stuff. Haven\'t seen one put up yet.

So if there\'s any issues with the skin, please let me know!

THIS IS THE MALE VERSION - Search Masquerade Jester FEMALE -Dark-

Also I am an Imperial Vampire, so I have a KILLER SUNTAN... KILLLERRRR SUNNNTAANNN... KIIIIILLLEEEEEERRRRRRR SSSUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUNNNN TAAAAAAAAAAAAAN (if you get the joke).







***NOTE: I CAN CHANGE COLORS****** (But they might not look beautiful haha). Just ask!
author: WarpAvP2
